cbuff_xwr16xx.c File Reference

The file implements the Platform specific CBUFF Driver Interface. More...

#include <stdint.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <ti/common/sys_common.h>
#include <ti/drivers/cbuff/include/cbuff_internal.h>

Variables

CBUFF_InterfaceFxn gCBUFFInterfaceFxn []
 This is the CBUFF supported high speed interfaces for XWR16xx. More...
 
CBUFF_setupTransferFxn gInterleavedTransferFxn []
 On the XWR16xx Interleaved mode is not supported. More...
 
CBUFF_setupTransferFxn gNonInterleavedTransferFxn []
 This is the function table which supports all the non-interleaved transfer functions. The default driver library supports all data formats in the non-interleaved mode. Modify this table and set to NULL any data format that is not required. Rebuild the driver and this will help reduce the application footprint.
 
CBUFF_setupTransferFxn gMultipleChirpNonInterleavedTransferFxn []
 This is the function table which supports all the non-interleaved transfer functions in Multiple Chirp Mode. The default driver library supports all data formats in the non-interleaved mode. Modify this table and set to NULL any data format that is not required. Rebuild the driver and this will help reduce the application footprint. NOTE: There are some transfer functions which are the same between single and multiple chirp. More...
 

Detailed Description

The file implements the Platform specific CBUFF Driver Interface.
